name: Laser Age: 300s
description:
Laser Age: 300s is a fast paced twin-stick shooter that will put your skills to the test. Can you survive for 300 seconds against the multiple waves of enemies that will come after you? Or will you challenge a friend in the local multiplayer mode?

Discover the world of Laser Age: 300s today!

*Multiplayer mode requires 2 gamepads.
